message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of recognizing video concepts using textual cues as means of supervision. This involves techniques related to computer vision (recognizing faces and actions in videos), natural language processing (processing linguistic descriptions), and machine learning (Multiple Instance Learning, Fuzzy Sets, Probabilistic Labels, and convex optimization). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), followed by cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
